thread.title: Allan DeLorme named Americas Division President

author: cnbc.com
title: Allan DeLorme named Americas Division President
text:
ARLINGTON, Va., April 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Leading global engineering and consulting firm Ramboll has announced the appointment of Allan DeLorme as Americas Division President for its Environment & Health (E&H) business.
Allan DeLorme, Americas Division President
Mr. DeLorme began his career with the company in 1990. He became a Principal in 2005, and then Managing Principal of the E&H northern California operations in 2007. Since 2012, he has served as the E&H Americas Division Director of Operations and then Chief Operating Officer (COO). A Civil and Environmental Engineer, his client work has focused within the Compliance, Strategy and Transaction and Site Solutions services. He remains an active practitioner and is currently managing Ramboll’s largest U.S. project.
In making the announcement, Thomas Vetrano, global E&H President and Managing Director, noted, “Throughout his tenure with the company, Allan has shown a strong commitment to both our clients and employees. As COO, he has been instrumental in our success and positive momentum across the Americas.”
Mr. DeLorme said, “During my nearly 30-year tenure, I have witnessed our growth into a global business with an excellent reputation for helping companies and governments to resolve their most challenging environmental and health issues. I look forward to working with colleagues across the Americas as we continue this trajectory of success as part of Ramboll.”
About Ramboll
Ramboll is a leading engineering, design and consultancy company founded in Denmark in 1945. With 300 offices in 35 countries, the company employs more than 13,000 experts globally. Ramboll combines local experience with a global knowledgebase constantly striving to achieve inspiring and exacting solutions that make a genuine difference to our clients, the end-users, and society at large. Ramboll works across the following markets: Buildings, Transport, Planning & Urban Design, Water, Environment & Health, Energy and Management Consulting. More information available at www.ramboll.com . Follow us on LinkedIn , Facebook and Twitter .
